members.member:
A public static class that provides useful Time utilities.
Author: Mathew Aloisio

member.name: P:TimeSystem.TimeManager.TIME_RETRIEVAL_MODE
member.summary: The TimeRetrievalMode being used to retrieve time.

member.name: M:TimeSystem.TimeManager.GetTime
member.summary: Returns the current time in seconds using the time retrieval method set by 'TimeManager.TIME_RETRIEVAL_MODE'.
member.returns: the current time in seconds using the time retrieval method set by 'TimeManager.TIME_RETRIEVAL_MODE'.

member.name: F:TimeSystem.TimeRetrievalMode.Default
member.summary: Use the default Time.time for time.
